text: James Scheffer (born June 8, 1970), better known by his stage name Jim Jonsin, is an American record producer, songwriter, businessman and DJ. He has collaborated numerous times with artists, including Akon, B.o.B, Pitbull, Rico Love, and Sean Paul. Category:1970 births Category:American DJs Category:American record producers Category:American songwriters Category:Musicians from Brooklyn Category:Living people
title: Jim Jonsin
